4 Survivor 'ın oyun içinde kaçış mücadelesi ve 1 katilin onları avlama hikayesini doyasıya yaşadığınız , ambians ve efektlerin son derece güzel olduğu 5 milyon kopya satan oyun. Bir çok farklı skill ve eşya kullanabildiğiniz her kailin ve survivorun kendine özgü özelliklerinin olduğu , ayrıca belirli bir seviyeden sonra bu skilleri birbirlerine öğretebildiği bir survivor oyunu , türünün şu an için eşli olarak oynanan en güzel oyun. Kesinlikle tavsie ederim , son derece keyifli vakit geçirebileceğiniz nacizane bir yapım , yeni patchler ve karekterler ile renklenmeye devam eden yüksek sesten sizi iliklerinize kadar gerecek bir oyun , kesinlikle kütüphanenizde bulunması gereken bir yapım.

游戏是好游戏，除了每次更新都会有一大堆BUG之外；制作组还是很好沟通的，并且也努力争取一些好版权杀手丰富游戏；
大伙经常抱怨的版本平衡问题，我想说的是这本来就是一个非对称游戏，多多少少不平衡其实是正常的，我们玩家能做的除了向制作组反馈这些以外，就只能去适应版本，去学会生存，去在黑暗中寻找一条通往黎明的道路，或者将逃生者从中献祭，反正我们都只来图个乐，为什么要有那么大火气呢

换装躲猫猫游戏，然而好看的衣服鲜艳亮丽，很不适合卡视角躲藏，而官方的目的是完全改为躲猫猫暖暖，这就要求你要穿奇丑无比的暗色衣服来不断修机成为机皇，所以这个游戏的核心内容就是：迅速找电机练习qte，没了，很无趣。屠夫？你可以试试萌新段位多长时间一局，因为萌新人类这个版本几乎特别恶劣对待，要么你等很久，要么偶尔进几个老人皇等开始吧。对了，萌新只要你现在不是游戏商倒数水平，路人局针对砍死老人皇我觉得没任何任何问题，砍不死，你就是当之无愧的手残，真的，你真的手残。
好游戏，真香

The game is fun, the community what's ruining this game. Killers want to nerf Survivors to death, and Survivors want to nerf Killers to death. In my opinion just remove all the perks and item add-ons, and maybe some offerings too. I really hope that the devs are not just buffing only killers/survivors, and nerfing the other to death. The minor bugs in my opinion are funny so it's not that big of a problem, but that doesn't mean that it shouldn't be fixed. The game is fun overall and I really like to play the game, I play for fun. Other people take the game too serious, that's why they are just toxic as hell. Devs keep up the good work and don't listen to the community, just play the game yourselves and balance the game by your choice.
这次更新的改动令人失望
这次改动，非常让我这老玩家失望，人类环境越来越堪忧，屠夫越来越无脑，游戏想往躲藏的方向发展，却对躲藏类技能没有什么实质提升的改动，现在就是被屠夫发现就是死，只要屠夫不傻，总能怼死人，更何况带高配的屠夫。反正更新到现在，我就没逃出过，目前越玩越恶心，各种顶配红处，什么时候能处理这些改档玩家？反正这一段时间我是不会再碰杀鸡了

Ottimo gioco e quasi unico nel suo genere.
Ha alcuni bug (tipo il giocatore che non si muove ad inizio partita... ma mi è successo una volta in 2 anni)
Il concetto è semplice:
1 giocatore Killer
4 giocatori Survivor

Il killer da la caccia a i sopravissuti che devono riuscire ad attivare 4 generatori per fuggire dalla mappa.

Do un voto positivo in quanto in praticamente 2000 ore di gioco ancora mi appassiono ed infurio quando i sopravissuti riescono a farmela sotto il naso!

Nell'ultimo periodo il gioco ha avuto problemi di bilanciamento, in quanto i sopravissuti avevano decisamente troppi "vantaggi" rispetto ai killer, tanto che ogni round sembrava più ina puntata di benny hill anziche un gioco Horror.
Nell'ultima patch è stato dato un po di respiro in piu ai Killer, cosa che trovo molto positiva (la maggior parte dei voti negativi che troverete sono proprio dovuti a questa patch... molti main survivor preferivano giocare a benny hill...).
Al momento direi che entrambi i ruoli sono molto divertenti, survivor in particolare quando giocato con amici, mentre il killer è ovviamente per chi gioca in solitaria.
Отличная игрушка.Советую ощутить это чувство, когда не добежал шаг до палетки !_!
~ 第一次评测，这次对人类的砍腿简直太伤，还对屠夫进行加强，简单来说玩这款游戏，直接去选择屠夫就好了。

Highly fun horror game, where four survivors try to survive against one killer who tries to sacrifice them for the Enity, a powerful being that has took survivors and the killers into a place where. Death is a not a escape.

Both survivors and killers can unlock perks, items and add-ons with can change up their playstyles. Allowing players to try out different strategys to fit their desires.

While there is a toxic community, pretty bad balancing (although they made a good amount of improvements and nerfed the meta perks which the survivor mains are bitching about). It's still a highly enjoyable game.

8.5/10

Patch 2.1.0 - Der Grund für die vielen negativen Reviews

Wenn ihr am Überlegen seid das Spiel zu kaufen, ignoriert bitte die negativen Reviews der letzten Tage.
Dieses Spiel war seit viel zu langer Zeit sehr Survivor lastig. Die Survivors konnten viel zu effektiv mit dem Killer herumspielen. Ich rede hier von hochrangigen Spielen. Richtig gute Survivor konnten den Killer 2-3 Minuten am Stück loopen, sodass in dieser Zeit locker 4-5 Generatoren gemacht werden konnten.

Als Killer hatte man ein Skill Cap: nämlich wie gut die Survivors sind. Dies besteht zwar immer noch, aber mit den letzten Änderungen wurde zum Mindest das Balancing ein wenig in die richtige Richtung geschickt. Gute Survivor können immer noch den Killer Ränge verlieren lassen. Aber es hat sich gebessert.

Der Killer ist und bleibt eine Rolle, bei dem sogar der beste Killer Spieler der Welt verlieren kann, wenn die Survivors perfekt spielen. Egal, ob er selbst perfekt spielt. Sowas sollte in einem asymetrischen Horror Game meines Erachtens nach nicht sein. Der Killer ist und bleibt die Power Rolle des Spiels. Ohne diesen Patch war die Killer Rolle so schlimm in höheren Rängen, dass es mir keinen Spaß, sondern Frust bereitet hat. Das Gamedesign ist nunmal leider so. Und mit den Leuten die sich jetzt beschweren befürchte ich, dass sich das Spiel wieder zu Gunsten der Survivors wenden wird, sodass die Killer sich wieder alles gefallen lassen müssen.

Ich hoffe, die Entwickler lassen sich nicht von den vielen salzigen Survivor mains beeinflussen. Ich selbst spiele beide Rollen und finde, dass Survivors schon lange viel zu mächtig waren.

Dead by Daylight is a 4 v 1 online survival horror game. 4 survivors face off against 1 killer as they try to power generators and escape before the killer sacrifices them on hooks for the entity.

The entity is the all powerful being that rules over the realm where the survivors and killers find themselves. 

The killers range from : The Hillbilly, Huntress, Nurse to well known slasher horror icons like Michael Myers and Leatherface.

KIller gameplay is standard fps fare while survivors have the advantage of playing in third person. Playing both modes is necessary if you want to master the game.

The gameplay is simplisitc but very addictive, no one game is the same as people have different playstyles which is heavily influenced by perks.

Ofc as killer you will enjoy the early ranks in the game but as you rank up you will start to meet SWF ( survive with friends) squads of 3-4 people. This can at times be infuriating as they use discord/other comms to give killer postion, totems/perks and its basically cheating. My advice to you is just proxy camp them as they will always go for their friends, its also scummy but show no mercy !

Survivor on the other hand starts off hard as you play in low ranks with people who make bad choices. Especially if you're alone with no friends to make it that much easier. Stick with it though as you will get better and start to breeze through matches while others die. JUst remember after 2 generators are done the hatch will spawn so you can escape if you're the last man standing!

Conclusion: A game worth buying if you enjoy the horror / survival genre. Also applicable if you have always wanted to play as Myers or Freddy Krueger, this game provides just that. Stay positive and just ignore the toxic idiots that spam end chat, FYI you can turn it off completely by clicking the arrows next to the chat box. Have fun and maybe I will see you in the fog.

If you try to play as a killer you´ll have to wait a loooong time for survivors to join, but at least playing a killer is so easy, a baby could do it. If you play a survivor you´ll find a lobby in no time, but stealth is impossible (there are aura-reading abilitys en masse that simply tell the killer where you are), once you are on the hook you WILL die ´cause the killer will watch you struggle to keep others from saving you. If you´ve been discovered prepare to run in loops as the killer quickly catches up to you, cause he´s olympic sprinter and you an obese midged (honestly, why are all survivors 1,5m and the killer 3m tall?!). You do can jump through windows or rarely throw down a pallet behind you (for some reason that doesn´t always triggeres and you´ll stand there like an idiot), if you try jumping through windows, keep in mind the killer can hit you through the window, so that really wont save you.
The best way to sometimes survive is (a friendly killer or) to play in team that talks together via discord/TS. You really want to play with friends anyway 'cause the rest of the community reached the toxic levels of LoL.
Killers do have an advantage and matchmaking is bad,so dont expect a fair game (its a killer after all) and dont even expect a decent balanced game. 
As a survivor please don´t get rid of the killer by running to others and please don´t unhook others right next to the killer (if there is the killer camping next to you, wave your arms on the hook by starting the free yourself animation repeatedly to tell the others its not safe).
 As killer, consider fair play and dont facecamp (you idiot).
Maps all look the same (mostly), graphics 7/10, random disconects and freezes are still a problem and for some reason the game was more fun when it was released with 3 maps then it is now.

Look at the reviews, especially the date of July 24th.

You wanna know, why these guys are instantly so negative about the game?
Not, because they think, that the game is misbalanced, repetitive and so on, after all, they're not angry about this suddenly from one Day to another.

The real reason is, that there was a misbalance heavily in favor of the survivors and these are survivor mains, who are pissed off, because on that day Patch 2.1.0 came out, heavily nerfing the survivors and buffing killers, thus balancing the game out.

They're angry, because they don't have an easy to win game anymore.

I play both sides regulary and now the game is more balanced and more fun. Thumbs up for the devs for doing the right thing, balancing the game. Ignore these negative reviews, the game is fun and somewhat addictive, maybe the Counterstrike of the Survival Horror Genre.

Many bugs. Community tends to be one of the worst, worse than DOTA and League of Legends combined. The fact that I've had to delete this review because of spiteful comments in regards to the game itself goes to show the nature of the toxicity of the playerbase of this game.

If you can get around that, it's okay, but the problem is you're essentially forced to play with these people. 
As a solo survivor, you will get "Camped" and die a lot. As a killer, your mileage will vary. Some days good, other days bad. Survivor is decent when you have friends to play with. Killer is decent if you can ignore the horrid community.

...oh yes and the game itself is often riddled with game-breaking bugs and many, many hackers/cheaters.

ak ste nový a plánujete hrať solo pripravte sa na vela hodín frustrácie a pomalého postupu
ak plánujete hrať s kamarátmi hra je fajn
či už za killera alebo survivora
bohužial ak hrajete solo hrať za killera sa vám bude zdať úžasné zo začiatu než sa dostanete na lepšie ranky kde budete
mať hry o niečo ťažšíe načo vás začiatočne jednoduché hry nepripravia
so survivorom to bude solo práve naopak začiatky budú neskutočne ťažké aj s priateľmi aspon prvé hodiny hry
ak plánujete hrať solo aj dalej treba si uvdeomiť že hra sa vyvíja v mysli  s tým že je už norma že ľudia hrajú spolu a preto je 
teraz hra vyvážená tak aby killer dokázal konkurovat skupine ľudí ktorí sa vedia dohodnúť cez TS/discord atd.
ak ste sám ste v nevýhode a vývojári odmietajú vám dať možnost komunikácie s náhodnými ľudmi v hre. 
napriek tomu že hra sa zmenila na toľko že podľa mna je to už nutnosť, s tým že kedysi hra bola zamýšlaná úplne naopak.

čo sa týka killera už  dlho som ho nehral, viem že boli časy keď to bolo za neho hrozné, približne vtedy som ho hral často.
potom sa veci pre killera zjednodušovali a prestalo ma to lákať. proti skupine ľudí si ale myslím že je to stále rovnako frustrujúce aj ked menej ako kedysi.

一年前ぐらいに購入したんですが、なかなか遊ぶ時間がなくずっと放置してきて最近になってやっと思い出してやるようになってようやくプレイ時間が100時間を越えました。よほどのことがない限りゲームを買っても一切レビューを書かない方なのですが、このゲームの開発会社のやり方があまりにも腹立たしいのでれレビューを書かせていただきます。
ご存知の通りこのゲームはサバイバー4人とキラー1人で対戦する非対称型対戦ゲームで、見方によりますが、いわゆる鬼ごっこのゲームです。ほぼサバ専で(キラーも時々やりますが)やってきた身としては、やっていて楽しいと思うのは、対戦を重ねるたびに自分が上手くなって生存率高くなるとか、スキルが揃って来るとかいう自分の成長を実感できる一面があるからだと思います。しかし、一番の醍醐味は、キラーを避けつつ黙々とジェネレーターを回してqte一個一個をこなしていくことになく、むしろキラーに見つかり、味方がジェネレーターを回す時間を稼ぐためにいかにしてキラーと出来るだけ長い時間追いかけっこを続けることにあるように思えてなりません。その間のキラーとの駆け引きに成功した快感、ミス１つでキラーに追い付かれ切りつけられる緊張感こそが私にこのゲームをプレイし続けさせてくれる理由になっていると思います。
しかし最近何ヶ月間のいくつかのアップデートによって、サバイバーの生存率などに大きく関わるスキルがナーフされたり、板倒しのタイミングとポジションの判定がだいぶ厳しくなったりと、まるで十数時間しかプレイをしていない初心者キラーにも簡単に何百時間もプレイしてきたサバイバーを殺せるように調整しているようにすら思えます。一番ひどいのは最近のアップデートでのサバイバーのスキル(スプバ)に対するナーフで、これによって前のようにジェネレーター何台分もの時間の間に追いかけっこを続けることがほぼ不可能になりました。(運要素も入っていますが)これは何がまずいのかというと調整入る前だと、キラー見ただけで身動き取れなくなるような初心者でも、一所懸命練習を続けるなり上手い人の動画を見るなりしていずれ初心者のキラーには触れやしないような上級者になれますが、このアップデートによって生存者の実力の伸びしろが大きく減少することになります。さらにいうと、上級者のキラーの実力が同じぐらい上級者の生存者のそれより大きく上回ることになる。いくら練習しても、板がなくなるとすぐ窮地に陥る。追いかけっこを楽しめるどころかむしろストレスになる。追いかけっこよりも黙々とジェネレーター回した方が生存率上がる。こういうゲームをやり続けても何が楽しかろう？
どこかで製作者が、原点回帰を目指したい、発売当初のホラゲーという位置付けを取り戻したいとおっしゃっているところをみましたが、原点回帰どころか、むしろこのゲームが積み上げてきた何かをぶち壊しているような気がしなくもない。

Devs only listen to one side of the community. It's good they are trying to balance, but there is simply nothing left to play as survivor. All you can do is hold mouse 1 at generators for 80 seconds. There is nothing else to do, NOTHING ELSE.
There's no source of fun left.

辣鸡制作组，TM只会削人类，削完板子削技能，现在还锁疲劳。还史诗级加强屠夫，你们是云制作组吗，连自己的游戏都不玩的？？？自己上游戏玩玩，是什么体验？去年这个时候入坑的，玩了922小时了，还一直希望制作组越做越好。游戏BUG不修复，TM2.0版本更新之后我在家就没进去过游戏，只能去网吧玩。不好好修复BUG，还学网易幼儿园出些丑比DLC，凤敏兔子装一直不出，天天只知道削人类，外国玩家水平差，你们就削人类加强屠夫？什么狗屁逻辑！昨晚看付导直播杀机，真的心疼，玩的心态都崩了，你们对得起一直支持你们的玩家和主播们吗？辣鸡，黎明杀机，卸载。本来游戏就劝退萌新，现在还劝退老玩家，你以为人人都是人皇？玩你妹的躲猫猫去吧，还给屠夫一堆透视技能。黎明死鸡正在路上，祝你们倒闭。

A funny Game with a lot of famous movie Killers! 

Pros +++ :

- Nice feeling if you play as Michael Myers and stalking people :))
- Funny Idea
- Horror Theme and scary moments
- Beautiful maps

Cons --- :

- The Killers needs more mechanics to kill the survivors
- To much generators for the survivor team. A good Team with a Communication System like TS3 are to fast for the Killer. Sometimes i've played rounds which where no longer than 45 seconds. Thats not really good.
- Childish Community, haters and flamers. Deactivate the chat after the rounds pls.  

My Score: 75% of 100%
垃圾改动， zz组sb
